description: '''Andromache Dimitropoulou''' ({{langx|el|Ανδρομάχη Δημητροπούλου}}, {{IPA|el|anðroˈmaçi ðimitroˈpulu|IPA}}; born 12 October 1994), known professionally as '''Andromache''' and sometimes '''Andromachi''', is a Greek singer who [[Cyprus in the Eurovision Song Contest 2022|represented Cyprus]] in the [[Eurovision Song Contest 2022]] with the song "[[Ela (Andromache song)|Ela]]".
